review: Oooh the pleasure of fairy tales; fractured and original.  This movie was a pure delight.  A large portion of the audience were children totally engrossed in the movie; you could hear a pin drop.  The children were so precious laughing throughout the movie.  The adults were laughing just as hard.It was unpredictable and pleasant to watch.  It will go into my home collection.  Bravo for the creativity.
